author: Sabrina Barr, Sabrina Barr
title: Coronavirus: Former Navy submariner's 'coping strategies' for self-isolation circulate on Twitter
description: 'Focus on little things that you enjoy and make plans for the future,' he says
content:
Over the coming weeks and months, many will have to face the prospect of spending the majority of their time if not all of it within the confines of their home.
The global spread of the coronavirus has meant that many people have had to self-isolate so as to… [+3744 chars]
